# cook your dish here
itr = int(input())
while itr :
 itr = itr - 1
 n = int(input())
 inp = [ int(n) for n in input().split()]
 ans = "Yes" if sum(inp) % n == 0 else "No"
 print(ans)

# cook your dish here

t = input()
for i in range(int(t)):
 n = int(input())
 a = input()
 arr = [int(x) for x in a.split()]
 ans = sum(arr)/n
 if int(ans) == ans:
  print('Yes')
 else:
  print('No')
